powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Utility.prestige_SelfRez
powers.display_help: If you are defeated, you may return to battle empowered by the effects of several types of large inspirations! After each use, you may not use this effect again for another hour. Note that Return to Battle is unaffected by Recharge Time changes
powers.display_short_help: Self Rez, Debt Protection, +Large Inspiration Effects

powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Utility.Renewal_of_Light
powers.display_help: A guardian spirit watches over you. If you are defeated, activating this power will restore you so you may continue the battle. The restoration blasts nearby foes with an explosion, knocking them down and Disorienting them. You will revive with about half of your Hit Points and Endurance. You will be invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds. Note that Renewal of Light is unaffected by Recharge Time changes

powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Utility.prestige_InspirationGrant
powers.display_help: You can look deep within yourself to find the inspiration necessary to overcome any obstacle. Using this power will award the player with 3 inspirations. Once used, you will be prevented from using this power again for 30 minutes. Note that Inner Inspiration is unaffected by Recharge Time changes

powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Utility.prestige_Permanent_SelfDestruction
powers.display_help: You explode! In doing so, you create a massive explosion which deals extreme damage to all foes in a large radius. Note that Self Destruction is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Damage: Extreme
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Smashing/Fire), Foe KB, Self Kill

powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Utility.Mystic_Fortune
powers.display_help: You can read the fortune of any player. This grants a random permanent buff for 20 minutes, and they may not have their fortune read again during that time. Note that Mystic Fortune is unaffected by Recharge Time changes

powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Utility.Secondary_Mutation
powers.display_help: You acquire a secondary mutation. This grants a random permanent buff for up to 20 minutes. No more than one Secondary Mutation can be in place at a time. Note that Secondary Mutation is unaffected by Recharge Time changes

powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Utility.prestige_reveal
powers.display_help: Your extensive knowledge of your surroundings will allow you to clear the "Fog of War" from any map once every 5 minutes.

powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Utility.Shadowy_Presence
powers.display_help: Activating this power shifts you into a semi-real shadow-state. So long as you are not attacked and remain motionless, you will have extremely good stealth rating and be nearly invisible. This power has a long, interruptible cast time and always takes 5 minutes to recharge. This power provides no benefit in PvP or in PvP zones. Note that Shadowy Presence is unaffected by Recharge Time changes

powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Utility.Portable_Workbench
powers.display_help: You can use this power to summon a Portable Workbench, which will allow anyone nearby to craft recipes. The Portable Workbench lasts 5 minutes when summoned and can be summoned every 5 minutes. You may not summon the Portable Workbench in PvP enabled areas. Note that Portable Workbench is unaffected by Recharge Time changes
